reviews.review: Fun an engaging class. She was a former member of the OBAMA administration and teaches concepts eloquently.  She makes the grant giving process feel both fun and challenging enough to stay engaged. The stories about Obama add a lot to the class experience. Would highly recommend.

name: PLCY214
title: Leading and Investing in Social Change: Re-defining and Experimenting with Philanthropy
description: Credit only granted for: PLCY214, PUAF214 or PUAF359I. Formerly: PUAF359I, PUAF214. Defines philanthropy as an exploration of how one develops a vision of the public good and then deploys resources (including donations, volunteers, and voluntary associations) to achieve an impact. Restricted to students in Carillon Communities.
